byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

abstract: Groupon disclosed in a company blog post that it had begun deliberately undercounting the number of times a deal had been purchased by consumers.
snippet: Groupon disclosed in a company blog post that it had begun deliberately undercounting the number of times a deal had been purchased by consumers.
lead_paragraph: Groupon has made it clear time and again that it doesn't quite want to act like the usual boring business. On Monday, the online coupon giant proved that yet again, by putting a new spin on transparency.

headline.main: Groupon: 'Transparent About Our Lack of Transparency'
